content: this pattern is a video tutorial for this simple granny square luggage tag experienced crocheters may be able to just make it on sight as it is easy i made the video for beginner crocheters who would like a fast simple and useful project enjoy use up scraps of any yarn from your yarn stash dk/ category 3 / 8 ply yarn is recommended but it really doesn t matter as long as it fits over your tag i used cotton however any yarn could be used although i used this used luggage tag to cover a black luggage tag you could just substitute the tag with cardboard as you can t see it anyway and crochet a strap to attach it to your bag
